DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of gatifloxacin 0.3% ophthalmic solution compared with ciprofloxacin 0.3% ophthalmic solution in patients with acute bacterial corneal ulcers
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Gatifloxacin Compared With Ciprofloxacin in Patients With Acute Bacterial Corneal Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis in one eye only of an acute bacterial corneal ulcer (>1mm) Corneal ulcer that in the opinion of the investigator had to be treated with fortified antibiotics, or multiple antibiotics, or antiinfectives other than study medication
